transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Deepak ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Deepak ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Haan ji baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Good morning sir, Shanaaya baat kar rahi hu servicing team IndiaMART se. Sir aap se last time baat hui thi, maine aapko bataya tha stories capacity aapko sir clear karne ke liye.
Customer: Kar diya tha maine usko. 
Executive: Aapne kar diya tha? 
Customer: Haan ji kal kaat diya tha maine.
Executive: Theek hai, toh abhi sir aapke paas inquiries aa rahe hai mail pe?
Customer: Mail pe nahi aaya mam.
Executive: Mail pe nahi aa raha hai sir?
Executive: Abhi jaise main dekh pa, main dekh pa rahi hu aapke paas abhi ek inquiry receive hui hai November ki sir, aapne woh check kara hai?
Customer: Ek minute check karta hu mam abhi.
Executive: Aap woh ek baar check kar lo sir, October ki bhi teen inquiry aa rakhi hai uski sir aap reply back kar do.
Executive: Saath mein sir aaj aapne by aapne ek number subah se ek ke beech mein aapne ek buylead consume kari thi uski sir feedback kya hai?
Customer: Mam rate root liye the unhone toh abhi bataya toh nahi.
Executive: Toh okay, theek hai matlab woh pricing ke liye sir aapko call. 
Customer: Haan price ke haan price ke liye call kare the.
Executive: Accha sir hamare reviews kaafi kam hai aap yeh bata sakte ho sir matlab ek ek reason mein ek Arjun Jaipur Rajasthan jo aapki jo deal fix hui thi tyre repair patches ki.
Executive: Unhone sirf aapko rating di hai sir iske alawa aap ab hamare paas sir ratings and reviews bhi kam hai sir toh iske kya issue aa rahi hai sir? Matlab aap humko bol nahi rahe ho sir ki aap ratings de do.
Customer: Toh mam abhi kuch log hi jude hai do teen char log hi jude honge shayad.
Executive: Aap toh khud se handle kar rahe ho IndiaMART ka portal?
Customer: Haan ji mam.
Executive: Ya fir sir koi marketing team bhi hai?
Customer: Nahi main hi kar raha hu.
Executive: Aap khud se hi kar rahe ho sir? 
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay toh sir pehle hum main aapko bata deti hu first toh sir aap buylead wagera consume karna start kar do saath mein inquiries ki bhi aap reply back kar do kyunki aise sir inactive show hoga toh hamari listing impact hogi sir. Secondary cheez aap. 
Customer: Matlab yeh. 
Executive: Ji? 
Customer: Kispe show karega buylead pe hi?
Executive: Buylead aur inquiries buylead aap consume kar lo matlab consume regular basis pe aap karna start kar do saath mein sir jo inquiries aa rakhi hai na uski sir reply back toh kar do kyunki sir aise toh buyer phir shift ho jayega na hamare competition mein.
Executive: Kyunki hum hi saamne se reply nahi kar rahe hai na. 
Customer: Haan ji mam.
Executive: Buyer toh hamare paas aa raha hai sir lekin hum usko usko entertain nahi kar rahe hai toh phir aise toh buyer buyer ka kya hai woh toh shift ho jayega usko toh bas product chahiye toh aise mein toh hamara business loss hoga na sir. 
Customer: Main samjh gaya.
Executive: Sir aap inquiries pe properly reply kar do saath mein aap aapke jo jinse bhi deal ho rahi hai na confirm deal done ho gayi hai aap at least sir unko na ratings and reviews ka bol do so that ki sir hamare paas ratings and reviews sahi rahe abhi sirf ek hi rating hai sir hamare paas mein. 
Customer: Theek hai mam. 
Executive: Ji aur main yeh jaanna chah rahi hu sir abhi aapne aaj koi buylead consume kari hai?
Customer: Nahi mam aaj nahi kari.
Executive: Okay theek hai aapne buylead request check kari hai sir?
Customer: Nahi aaj mam bahar gaya hua tha mam abhi.
Executive: Accha okay theek hai sir main main ek baar aapko bata deti hu abhi sir hum main product line isme update kar rahe hai Omni tyre repair patches mein kar rahe hai kya?
Customer: Omni company brand alag hi honge.
Executive: Omni main nahi bata sakti. 
Customer: Omni jaise brand hai company hai.
Executive: Accha haan. 
Customer: Patch toh bana rahe hai apna apna khud ka brand hai alag se One Top ke naam se hai.
Executive: One Top. Dete to buy tyre repair patches hai na sir? 
Customer: Haan ji mam.
Executive: Toh agar normal tyre repair patch kab aayega toh hum woh consume kar sakte hai na bhai? 
Customer: Haan ji woh kar sakte hai haan woh kar sakte hai.
Executive: Pan India mein?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Pan India mein kar sakte hai ya nearby sir?
Customer: Nearby kar sakte hai.
Executive: Nearby kar sakte hai sir. 
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay nearby sir ek second. Abhi sir hum UP side deal kar rahe hai kya?
Customer: Haan ji mam.
Executive: UP side kar rahe hai okay. Kyunki sir abhi na kuch buylead aa rakhi hai sir toh main aapko sir whatsapp pe yeh pin kar dungi aap ek baar bas bata do yeh relevant hai ya nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai aap kar dijiye whatsapp pe. 
Executive: Haan ek second ek second sir.
Executive: Sir Haryana mein kar sakte hai hum deal? 
Customer: Haan ji mam kar sakte hai.
Executive: Okay. Haryana mein ek deal hui hai mam Guhana mein ek party se deal hui hai 40 se 50 hazar ka.
Customer: 40 se 50 hazar ke beech ka agar aa toh hum Haryana mein kar sakte hai right? 
Customer: Deal hui hai hamari 40 se 50 hazar ek Guhana mein ek party se deal hui hai.
Executive: Okay abhi recent mein hui hai? 
Customer: Hui hai mam. Yeh do mahine ho gaye mam.
Executive: Okay aapne un abhi unse contact hai sir aapka?
Customer: Haan ji woh toh contact mein hai abhi abhi unka abhi ka nahi hai abhi jaise woh khatam hote hi order karenge. 
Executive: Unse ek baar agar aap contact mein ho toh aap unse ek baar bol lo na ratings and reviews ka. Ki sir aap aapka product wagera toh deliver bhi ho hi gaya hoga toh sir aap. 
Customer: Haan ji unka ho gaya.
Executive: Toh sir aap please ratings de do. 
Customer: Theek hai mam.
Executive: Theek hai sir aur baaki main aapko kuch buylead jo hai woh whatsapp par de rahi hu aap ek baar check kar lena and then sir aap consume kar lena aur sir please properly active rahiye sir so that hume business mein hamara buyer shift na ho. Theek hai sir. 
Customer: Theek hai mam. 
Customer: Theek hai mam haan ji haan ji. Okay sir thank you sir.
Customer: Okay mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving inquiries on mail.

- Reviews and ratings are very less.

- Customer has not consumed any buyleads today.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to check the inquiries.

- Executive shared the importance of ratings and reviews.

- Executive shared the importance of consuming buyleads.

- Executive will share buyleads on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the buyleads on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, ratings, reviews
